verbose_text: Further analysis of c.20 +544 G> T in ENCODE data (Ensembl) identified this precise base location in intron 1 as a bivalent histone modification site, with histone H3 lysine 4 trimethylation (H3K4me3) and histone H3 lysine 27 trimethylation (H3K27me3) modifications in different cell types, which are associated with gene activation and repression, respectively XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR (XREF_TABLE and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
